about_the_game:
Gravity Is Your Friend

Use the force of gravity to aim your shots around planets and asteroids. Destructible planets take damage as your missiles crash into them. Take turns battling until only one team remains.

Defeat Your Enemy

Face off against a variety of different teams in the single player campaign, each with their own personality, story and motives. Battle against teams around the world in online multiplayer.

Blast Off On A Stellar Journey Across the Galaxy

Space is really big. Discover and destroy on a planetary scale. Travel across the galaxy map or generate your own maps for multiplayer. Infinite possibilities in an infinitely expanding universe.

Get Kitted Out For A Deadly Space Walk

Unlock helmets and gear as you progress through the game to personalize your team. In space no one can hear you scream, but they can see your questionable fashion choices!

Features

Story-based Single Player Campaign
Up to 4 Players Multiplayer Online
Different level elements including: destructible planets, suns, black holes, electric shields, mines, asteroids, wormholes
Dozens of weapon types including: bazooka, cluster, repeater, triple shot, mines, meteor strikes, nukes, drills, rovers
Variety of game modes
Loads of unlockable helmets and gear

name: Gravitee Wars
short_description: Battle across the galaxy in this turn-based space artillery game. Use the gravity of destructible planets to launch your shots at the enemy until only one team remains.Unlock new gear for your team members in the single player campaign and online multiplayer modes.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish
